definitions.definition: a person whose job it is to work as a member of the crew of a commercial or naval ship or boat, especially one who is below the rank of officer.
examples: seaman, seafarer, mariner; Moreboatman, yachtsman, hand; informal(old) salt, sea dog, rating, bluejacket; matelot "his mentor at sea was a well-seasoned sailor named Coates"Moreboatman, yachtsman, hand; (old) salt, sea dog, rating, bluejacket; matelot his mentor at sea was a well-seasoned sailor named Coates

definitions.definition: a person who goes sailing as a sport or recreation.
a person who rarely (or often) becomes sick at sea in rough weather.
examples: noun: good sailor; plural noun: good sailors; noun: bad sailor; plural noun: bad sailors
